Title: My Mother's Smile
Actors: Sergio Castellitto, Jacqueline Lustig, Chiara Conti, Gigio Alberti
Plot: Ernesto is a successful artist who has his life turned upside down by his family's wishes for the canonization of his murdered mother. His extreme dislike for her ignorant ways brings about a greater connection with his insane brother who killed her, while his other brothers favor her beatification. There is a struggle of wills and will power.
